bill_title: to prohibit a public corporation from submitting a bid if that public corporation is requesting the bid.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to prohibit a public corporation from submitting a bid if that public corporation is requesting the bid. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 5-18 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: If the governing body of any public corporation, or any entity created or controlled, in whole or in part, by a public corporation, advertises for bids for any goods or services, the public corporation, or any entity created or controlled, in whole or in part, by the public corporation, may not submit a bid. This section does not prohibit any public corporation, or any entity created or controlled, in whole or in part, by a public corporation, from providing any goods or services for the public corporation. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
